name: christopher trochez
text: When I was a kid there was a Shakey's at Westside Shopping Center next to the trampolines and movie theater. Eventually it closed. Fast forward 40 years or so and I find this on the way home from a road trip.  Part of the original chain. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam Ochs
text: The best pizza places i have ever eaten at....Hands Down the best.   I have eaten at this franchise since I was a child at the location in WR Georgia, since closed.....I can't believe the corporate office of this great restaurant won't ‚Ä¶More

name: Rommel Cruz
text: Shakey's in my opinion is a very underrated restaurant here in the U.S. I don't know if it has been at one point a popular pizza place here, but in the Philippines where i'm from, Shakey's is favorite hangout for families, friends, and even ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Heintzman
text: Stopped here with a friend that remembered going to Shakey's as a kid growing up; after baseball games, with his parents and siblings, etc. It brought back some wonderful memories for him. So, after all the years that have passed since his ‚Ä¶More

name: Colleen Stephens
text: Stopped in on our way to Florida for a quick bite. The very best pizza I have ever had. The ingredients were so fresh and the crust is to die for. Do not miss this great pizza restaurant. I will definitely make this my go to for pizza. The service and atmosphere were awesome.

name: Yeojin Kim
text: One of the best pizza I‚Äôve ever tasted! Ordered half-n-half Supreme and Spicy. Excellent combination. Ingredients were fresh and the crust was crunchy and perfect!  The staff was awesome and the owner was very welcoming. We will be back for sure!

name: Toast McGoats
text: The pizza is really good especially for the price. For my first visit I got a personal sized pizza, which was very good. I also got the salad bar added.  The salad bar has a lot of variety and everything was fresh. The restaurant is clean and the staff was friendly and helpful.

name: Dick Jones
text: Excellent food and employees who go the extra miles for the customers.  We drive over 100 miles each way to eat at Shakey's.  THAT'S how good it is...

name: Charles Stephens
text: Stopped in for lunch today. Pizza was great! The ingredients seemed very fresh. Much better than your average pizza restaurant.

name: Justin Cantrell
text: Nice place, great lunch special. Love the salad and pizza is so good. Has an arcade if you have kids, and employees were very friendly!

name: M Hubbard
text: Great pizza, nothing like it in Auburn. GMO free pizza crust made from Italian flour. Crispy with the right amount of chewy. Flavorful sauce. Real toppings, nothing from a can. My new favorite!

name: Kami Scarborough
text: Food is consistently good. Shakey's has a nice buffet during lunch with a variety to choose from: pizza, spaghetti, salad bar, chicken, as well as sides such as mac and cheese and fried okra.  Our kids love the arcade area and playing there ‚Ä¶More

name: Mackenzie Winter
text: Really great food for a really great price. The pizza was delicious, and the staff was super friendly! The service was also really quick!

name: Kathryne Drlicka
text: It was great to relive childhood memories!

name: Mr. Balance Daniels
text: It was great I really enjoyed it. It looked like Its been running for a very long time and I'm very nostalgic. I also think that they should add more types of pizzas. Other that that the experience was superb. üëçüòÅüëç

name: Gabriella Santiesteban
text: Came here for lunch with my husband and we were greeted right away. We decided to share a small Hawaiian pizza (big enough to share for 2) and i'm so glad we did. Their crust can't be compared to any other pizza place, it's that good. Will be back to try their sandwiches.

name: Lincoln Hughes
text: The Pizza was wonderful, but it took a while to get it to the buffet. When I went through the first time there were only 3 available options. Second time around there was significantly more. It is a smaller buffet so it may have just reached capacity. Overall a good experiance and the kids loved it.

name: Ritch Melton
text: Excellent Roman crust that was perfectly crisped. The sauce and cheese were slightly over proportioned but a decent pie all around

name: T Hub
text: My wife and I tried out Piazza in Auburn, and it was amazing!  Great pizza made with fresh ingredients.  Awesome crust.  Will be back.

name: Bruce Sandlin
text: First visit, very good pizza - like the Roman style. Liked salad bar. Will go back!

name: chris adkins
text: Not what we remembered in the 80's but a nice group of employees. All you can eat pizza, salad, chicken and sides. Atmosphere was a reminder of the 80's with large screens playing music videos. They also have a small showcase with old ‚Ä¶More

name: Holly Macintire
text: Pizza is a little over priced. But still a lot cheaper than " Good Times" on Glenn in Auburn. Some of the game machines took your money and gave nothing in return. There was no one working the game room the whole time we were there. This was at 6:15 pm on a Monday. The manager was super nice and let us pick extra prizes tho.

name: Elaine Bowman
text: We went rather late and the employees were super friendly and the food was great. Definitely will go back.

name: Connor M.
text: It‚Äôs probably the best pizza in Auburn, have been there 3 times since it opened already!

name: Stephanie Williams
text: Great food, fun and games!! Live TV, great atmosphere. Customer service was great!

name: Kelly Nelson
text: Huge improvement over Shakey's....great lunch deal and as good a pizza as we have found in A/O area.

name: Faye Rosario
text: We are headed to Destin Florida. And my daughter-in-law is very aware of this place. She is the one who recommended  us to stop. It was my first time there and it was absolutely fabulous. The food is totally amazing. I wish they had one in Athens Georgia. I highly recommend this restaurant.üëçüíñüëç

name: jim john
text: Came all the way from Evansdale, Iowa for Shakey's!  A few things have changed but so glad we came here!

name: Eric Frey
text: 2-9 inch pizzas, which they said is a medium; and 2 soft drinks for the low, low price of $42. As a previous customer stated, there were tiny gumball size Italian sausages scattered mostly around the middle off the pizza. The mushrooms were ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Underwood
text: Restaurants was clean and service wasn't bad. Not alot of buffet selection. Will prepare it if not on buffet but have to wait for it is all.

name: radar1200
text: The lunch buffet is pretty good at a fair price. They serve pasta, fried chicken, mac&cheese, garlic bread and various other side items in addition to pizza. The buffet is offered Sunday-Friday. My husband and I went for dinner and found ‚Ä¶More

name: John Freeman
text: Great supervisor! Oh yeah, the pizza is good also.:)

name: Steven Rush
text: Big problem with Shakey's of Auburn - You will not want to go to other pizza places anymore after you go there! Don't say I didn't warn you! I've had delicious food in a nice building with fun decor and friendly staff on each and every ‚Ä¶More

name: Cydney Dorsey
text: Fun for families! Have hosted a couple of birthday parties here and have been to several others. Service is fine, but not exemplary. Food is good, but not outstanding. The kids enjoy the arcade and the private party area is certainly a benefit.

name: Austin Adkison
text: Good pizza and mojo potatoes!

name: Kirsten Hall
text: Yummy!!!! My dad grew up eating Shakey's pizza and introduced us a couple years ago in GA. That location has now closed, so this is the closest one to us, 4 hours away. We stopped here on our way home from Florida last year, and the food is ‚Ä¶More

name: Les Duffield
text: Food was good, service and atmosphere were great.

name: Teri Gudgel
text: Pizza buffet, garlic bread, fried chicken, salad bar and more for $12. Very tasty!!

name: Jason Summers
text: Great place to take the kids.  Food is good and we've never had a problem with the service.  I wish the arcade was a little larger though.

name: Audfilm
text: If you already know Shakeys from 60s and 70s, this gets all the flavors and textures just right.

name: Bobby Windham
text: love it,  a throwback to childhood at our favorite pizza place. As an Alabama fan it one of the few places Ill spend money in Auburn. Roll Tide.

name: Stephanie Davidson
text: Shakeys is wonderful for a family outing, birthday party, or a fun date. The pizza is tasty and the game room is an added bonus.

name: Karl Adams
text: Once a great pizza chain using superb ingredients that is now substituting generic replacements to save a buck.  I ordered a sausage pizza and they bought a pizza to the table that looked like a cheap frozen food tostinos pizza from the ‚Ä¶More

name: Joseph Cooner
text: by far the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had.

name: Brandi Wilson
text: Daniel and his shift tonight, 9/2/17, were awesome and made my Birthday Daughter feel like she was on top of the world! Thank you! Oh and the food was amazing, I have never had sourdough crust that tastes that good. The Texas BBQ pizza was AWESOME too! Again, thank you, you will see me again!

name: Cynthia Davis
text: Lunch buffet mediocre at best. Nothing appeared to be house made, rather straight from a can. Salad bar had minimal offerings. Nothing special about the food ... My 1st and last time eating here.

name: Diane Peterson
text: Tasty pizza and awesome salad.  It was our first visit TV,  but not our last!

name: Cleverous George
text: Everything you get here is amazing. No matter if it doesn't s thin crust, to thick crust, or if it is even the salad bar. There is also an arcade that can keep your kids occupied.

name: Monica Hodge
text: Very nice and clean. Very friendly. Food was awesome. Everything was hot and ready. Didn't take long to come out. Love the atmosphere. Good place to go to watch the game on tv.

name: Andrew Roxby
text: Food was filling, friendly and clean atmosphere, food was what you'd expect from a chain restaurant.

name: Carrie Dannelly
text: Fun place to bring the kids and also enjoy some food with adult beverages. Good family environment. Lots of games for the kids to play. A little pricey with the tokens and games but worth the splurge every once and awhile.

name: Marshall Foster
text: Food wasn't good at all and very over priced. Only reason I'm giving 1 star is bc the arcade room is fun.

name: Clarence Polla
text:
The pizza is still the best ever
No other pizza can touch it. Eating there brought back sooooo many memories from when we had a Shakey's in Maryland

name: Beth Giles
text: We missed the lunch buffet, so we had pizza, chicken, and mojo potatoes instead. Fantastic! Just like I remember from Warner Robins, Georgia!

name: Chuck Linderman
text: Good pizza friendly staff and an unbelievable game room. Plenty of good music. Affordable , clean and pizzas any way you can imagine.

name: Jonathan Scandlyn
text: We had my daughter's birthday party Shakey's & everything was perfect.  The staff was incredibly friendly & accommodating.

name: Hailey Meadows
text: I loved going to shakeys!!! The cashier wasn‚Äôt very informative! They got my order wrong and refused to fix it! When it is their fault something is wrong, you fix it!!! The manager is RUDE!!!

name: Shirley Dennison
text: I'm a regular customer of Shakeys Pizza Parlor that is the best  place for food just try the fried chicken and everything else will just fall in place eat in or out it's all the same taste. Oh the game room is just amazing so bring your kids.they will love it. Come on to Shakeys that is the Place umumum. Enjoy

name: Serena Poteet
text: The Pizza was a C+ at best... only reason I‚Äôm giving three stars is because my daughter loved the arcade.

name: Melissa Monroe
text: Great time each time we go but prices could be more affordable or at least run more specials.

name: Brittany Moss
text: The pizza is very good. There are No healthy options. They do have a salad bar but it's not very good. All the lettuce was the hard core from iceberg.  There's no meat on it. They do have chicken fingers but they are fried. I took the kids ‚Ä¶More

name: Robby Watson
text: Great family fun time and the pizza üçï is good too!

name: Robert Maleschusky
text: I also grew up eating Shakey's in Norman, ok! I love this pizza and will go many miles out of my way to eat here. Maybe once a year I'll find a Shakey's in southern California and used to find them all over the Midwest as I drive for a ‚Ä¶More

name: Anastasia Monroe
text: I had the Texas bbq pizza, it was the absolute best I've had in a very long time.

name: Bill Berry
text: It's not Chucky Cheese but despite the prices being the same, it is a better pizza and you can order fried chicken. The tokens are 25 cents each and they did take cash or debit/credit cards in exchange for tokens.

name: Danny Alvarado
text: Long place from home. California to Alabama nothing has changed good pizza and fried chicken.

name: Sherri Z
text: Awesome place. Good food.  Kids love it

name: Connie Brewer
text: Great food & very friendly staff, especially Daniel-he is always glad to see usüòä

name: danny newton
text: Pizza was decent. Game room was weak. Fried chicken smelled great but we didn't order that. They were out of chicken tenders.

name: Ana Lopez-Jordan
text: the food can be pricey but it‚Äôs worth every penny! i love coming here with my family it‚Äôs a great place to relax and eat some great food

name: Britelitefrite X
text: Just like you remember from the 60s and 70s. The taste took me back! Delicious!

name: Augusta Bryant
text: Very friendly staff and great food. Me and my husband enjoyed the friendly atmosphere there. Great people.

name: Mona Green
text: The staff was Great they come around to make sure you are ok. The young man that took your order was very polite and talkative made you feel welcome. The food was not dry it's was hot and fresh.

name: Robert Montgomery
text: Its hit or miss here. Sometimes good sometimes bad

name: Rap McBurney
text: We arrived about 11:15 Sunday, ordered pizza, chicken fingers, drinks.  All delivered promptly, clean facility, plenty of room for our family of 10 ages 92 to 1.5.  Good food, BUT when it came time for the arcade, big disappointment.  About ‚Ä¶More

name: josiewells outlaw
text: Good hot fresh food , nice employs, clean place to eat.

name: Daniel Gonzalez
text: What me and my wife refer to as cartoon pizza. Nothing particularly special about the pizza but it was good. Great ambience, friendly staff. We would definitely come back to try something else.

name: Addie Adkison
text: Great fun for kids but I wouldn't eat anything fried.  Their grease tastes funny.

name: Ashley Fausett
text: The service is excellent. The atmosphere is great. The food is awesome!

name: Angie Rice
text: Quick and nice to eat. Everything was fresh. Clean store.

name: Nichole Gheen
text: Great staff great food

name: Frog Price
text: Loved this place. Great food. Will be a destination stop for us. Loved the decor. Great food and service.

name: Diane Brooks
text: The kids had a blast...I had a great time too. It's a great place for the entire family. Good food and games.

name: Silvia Alor
text: The wait is long but well worth it best pizza. üòÅ

name: Brian Dennis
text: Great family restaurant. Pizza was great

name: Wendy Blame
text: Love this place.  It reminds me of being back home in California.

name: Tracy Lisenby
text: We stop here after the AISA district math competition with about 25 students and adults. We get our food quickly and the kids love the game room! Great pizza and salad bar!

name: John Sentell
text: Decent pizza and atmosphere.  Seemed a bit too pricey for the overall quality and experience.

name: Richard Cady
text: Sauce was right chicken and jojos were right crust was off though there is no way to get the true shakeys flavor without the brick oven that traditional shakeys use still good and will return wish they would dump the conveyor belt oven though

name: Denise Ruiz
text: I wasn't at all impressed. Pizza was so so. Salad bar lettuce wasn't fresh and I was sick not long after we got home . Staff was friendly tho.

name: Fern Barrett
text: Had a most wonderful time. Food was great place was extremely clean and play time for the grandkids was awesome. Thank you.

name: Debbie Arcuri
text: By far the best pizza I have ever eaten. I wish they would come to the Augusta Georgia area

name: Derick Mitchell
text: Great chicken! We miss Shakeys, we loved your food.

name: galleri
text: Disappointed we weren't able to get the buffet, that wasn't their fault though. The pizza was ok. I have had better pizza and just didn't seem to taste like it did years ago. Place was really dirty also.

name: 3 Little Monkeys
text: We have fond memories of Shakeys growing up.  We drive an hour to get to this particular location in Auburn for the lunch buffet.  It is always a special day. The fried chicken is wonderful and the staff are incredibly kind.  They have a ‚Ä¶More

name: Kathy Brown
text: Been coming here for a few years when passing through.  Always delish, prompt service, clean, and friendly staff.  Thin crust is outstanding!

name: Joyce Nelson
text: Went in to see bout 7year old family birthday party looked very clean

name: Alsha
text: My family and I forget about this place all the time..    but it's a family friendly environment

name: Ry Good
text: Great Deep Dish (most of the time).  Regular Price ($21.99) is terrible.  $6.99 for large deep dish Mon-Thurs 2-5PM is AWSOME DEAL.  Still my favorite deep dish but in no way worth the $22.

name: Lynn Purvis
text: Always good and always clean

name: Jamie Paul
text: it's about what you'd expect from a pizza buffet. the mac n cheese is good and the salad bar is big

name: Conrad Flores
text: Great Buffet.  Best Fried Chicken (IMHO) In Auburn.

name: Jenifer Jones
text: Great place for a good buffet during the week and on Sundays between 11am - 2pm

name: Joseph Tuck

name: Rip from Cecil
text: We drove fifty miles for this pizza and we were not disappointed. I remember this chain as a kid and should I say," I'm hooked on it again."

name: Jason Scott
text: Lunch prices are outrageous! Highest prices in auburn, and everything in auburn is high. Only 5 medoicre pizzas to choose from. Some pizza was lukewarm. Only good thing there is fried chicken, not pizza! This is a terrible joke that nobody ‚Ä¶More

text: Our first visit to a Shakey's in over 30 years.  The "Munch a bunch of lunch" buffet had various pizzas, fried chicken, fried sliced potatoes, salad bar, spaghetti, and more. It was very good.

name: Cindy King
text: I love Shakeys Pizza for their food and atmosphere.  I wish there was a location in the Phenix City/Columbus area. The only negative thing I can say is their prices are high for what you get if you are ordering straight from the menu. ‚Ä¶More

text: We enjoyed the feeling of nostalgia! The staff were very nice and the food was great!

name: Edward Napper

name: Kim G
